message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value, I'm initially pricing it at $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I'm not sure I can meet your initial price. I'd like to make a counteroffer. I'm thinking more along the lines of $12,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price. While I can't go as low as $12,000, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this offer represents a fair compromise.
I appreciate the compromise, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'd like to make a counteroffer of $14,000 for the product.
